Class Library

java.lang.Object
Library
public class Library extends Object
Class name: Library This class represents a library and its collection of books. It provides methods for loading books from a text file, adding new books to the collection, listing all books in the collection remove books from the file, and backup an old version of the file before doing new changes.

    • loadBooksFromFile

      public void loadBooksFromFile(String Books_Database) throws IOException
      Method name: loadBooksFromFile This method loads books from a text file into the library's collection of books.
      Parameters:
      Books_Database - The path to the text file containing the books to be loaded.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred

    • addBookToFile

      public void addBookToFile(String Books_Database) throws IOException
      Method name: addBookToFile This method adds a new book to the library's collection and saves it to a text file.
      Parameters:
      Books_Database - The path to the text file where the new book will be saved.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred

    • removeBook

      public void removeBook(int id) throws IOException
      Method name: removeBook This method removes a book from the library's collection using its ID number.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID number of the book to be removed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred

    • backupDatabase

      public void backupDatabase(String originalFile, String backupFile) throws IOException
      Method name: backupDatabase This method creates a backup of the original database file.
      Parameters:
      originalFile - The path to the original database file.
      backupFile - The path to the backup file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred

    • updateDatabase

      public void updateDatabase(String filename) throws IOException
      Method name: updateDatabase This method saves changes made to the library's collection of books to the database text file.

      filename - The path to the database text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred
